about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know me better - my interests, inspirations, and what drives me.
about.description1: I am a Cognitive Science student at the University of Warsaw, passionate about artificial intelligence, Large Language Models, and data-driven reasoning.
about.description2: I have experience in Python, data analysis, and technical documentation. I specialize in building AI workflows and integrating language models into practical systems.
about.description3: Currently, I am on an Erasmus exchange at the University of the Basque Country in Spain, broadening my horizons in cognitive and computational sciences.

interests.title: Cognitive Science
interests.description: Fascinated by machine learning algorithms, futurology, modeling, and cognitive sciences.

experiences.title: AI Intern
experiences.description: Co-creating Hexdag - an open-source framework for AI agent orchestration. Creating Python modules for task management, tool integration, and safe LLM parsing.
highlights: Developing Hexdag framework for AI agents
Python modules for task & flow management

experiences.title: Office Assistant & Technical Support
experiences.description: Training medical personnel on high-fidelity simulators. Translating technical instructions for medical devices (EN‚ÜíPL).

experiences.title: Mathematics Tutor
experiences.description: Conducting individual math lessons. Creating personalized learning plans and adapting teaching methods to students' needs.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Projects showcasing my skills in AI and programming.

projectList.title: Hexdag Contributions
projectList.description: Contribution to the development of an open-source framework for AI agent orchestration at OMNIVISER.
projectList.longDescription:
My contribution to the Hexdag project includes:
‚Ä¢ Creating Python modules for task and flow management
‚Ä¢ Implementing integration with external tools and APIs
‚Ä¢ Safe parsing and data extraction from LLM responses
‚Ä¢ Creating technical documentation and usage examples
‚Ä¢ Code reviews and collaboration on pull requests

projectList.title: Open-Domain QA with RAG (TriviaQA)
projectList.description: Retrieval-Augmented Generation system for answering open-domain questions. Architecture: BM25 Retrieval ‚Üí CrossEncoder Reranking ‚Üí TinyLlama Generation.
projectList.longDescription:
Project implementing a full RAG pipeline for Question Answering:
‚Ä¢ BM25 sparse retrieval for document search
‚Ä¢ CrossEncoder (MS-MARCO) for reranking top-10 ‚Üí top-3
‚Ä¢ TinyLlama-1.1B-Chat for answer generation

projectList.title: Helpdesk Chatbot Assistant
projectList.description: Console AI assistant using Google Gemini API for interactive helpdesk form filling.
projectList.longDescription:
Console application using generative AI:
‚Ä¢ Interactive chat to collect form data
‚Ä¢ Field validation (name, surname, email, reason for contact, urgency 1-10)
‚Ä¢ Save to JSON after conversation ends
‚Ä¢ Full Docker containerization

aiTools.title: How I Use AI
aiTools.subtitle: My tech stack and approach to software development in the AI era.

tools.title: Vibe Engineering
tools.description: A philosophy of working with AI that prioritizes intuition and flow. Using LLM as a creative partner, not just a tool for generating code.

tools.title: Cursor AI
tools.description: My main code editor. An AI-native IDE that revolutionizes the way software is written, allowing for full-file editing and refactoring in natural language.

tools.title: Replit
tools.description: Fast prototyping and deployment of applications in the cloud. The ideal environment for testing ideas and sharing code without environment configuration.

tools.title: Lovable
tools.description: An AI-powered tool for creating user interfaces. Allows transforming ideas into beautiful, functional React/Tailwind code in the blink of an eye.

tools.title: Supabase
tools.description: Backend-as-a-Service that integrates perfectly with the modern AI stack. Postgres database, authentication, and data vectorization in one place.

tools.title: Google Antigravity
tools.description: Experimental and advanced AI systems from Google. I use the latest achievements in the field of language models and autonomous agents.

additionalInfo.achievementDesc: In collaboration with Just Join IT. As part of the prize, I participated in filming a documentary about FinalSpark - a startup creating the first computer using human neurons for calculations!

chatbot.title: AI Assistant
chatbot.initialMessage: Hi! I'm Wojtek. Ask me about AI projects, cognitive science studies, favorite books, or my experience with LLMs
chatbot.error: Sorry, an error occurred. Please try again.

fallback.default: Hey! The chatbot is in demo mode. In the meantime, ask about my AI projects.
fallback.greeting: Hi! I'm Wojtek. Ask me about AI projects, cognitive science studies, or favorite books.
fallback.projects: My main project is a RAG Question Answering system. I use BM25 + CrossEncoder + TinyLlama. Check GitHub: github.com/Wojz12/RAG_LLM_project
fallback.cv: I work as an AI Intern at OMNIVISER - developing Hexdag framework for AI agent orchestration. You can find my CV in the CV section.
fallback.skills: I specialize in: Python, LLMs, Prompt Engineering, RAG Systems, Git. I use ChatGPT, Cursor AI, Hugging Face.
fallback.books: I recommend: "Brain Wash" (Perlmutter), "21 Lessons" (Harari), "How the Mind Works" (Pinker), "Deep Learning" (Goodfellow), and "The Last Economy" (Mostaque).
fallback.education: I study Cognitive Science at UW. Currently, I am on Erasmus at the University of the Basque Country in Spain.
fallback.contest: I won the "Dream Job" contest by Just Join IT. As a prize, I participated in a film about FinalSpark - a startup creating a computer based on human neurons. I was in Switzerland.
